title: Simulation-Based Intensive Short-Term Course for Strengthening Multicultural Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Multicultural Societies and Pedagogical Concepts
context.additional_context: Hands-on VR simulation-based education in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Participants can select appropriate instructional strategies with over 85% accuracy in VR simulations based on multicultural education theory
Participants demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in multicultural education readiness index scores in pre-post surveys
Participants can apply three or more effective mediation techniques in conflict situations with learners from diverse cultural backgrounds
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
